mapper.select: SELECT ID, NAME, EMAIL, PW, PHONENUMBER, CODE, AUTH, ALARM, ALARMTIME, POINT FROM MEMBER WHERE auth = 1
SELECT ID, NAME, EMAIL, PW, PHONENUMBER, CODE, AUTH, ALARM, ALARMTIME, POINT FROM MEMBER WHERE SUBSTR(code,1,1) = SUBSTR((SELECT CODE FROM MEMBER WHERE id=#{id}),1,1) AND NOT id = #{id} AND auth = 1
SELECT NAME, LOCATION, CODE FROM HOSPITAL WHERE code = (SELECT CODE FROM MEMBER WHERE id = #{id})
